urls.title: Oman Air Receives Passenger-Ranked APEX Five-Star Major Airline Award 2023
urls.description: Oman Air, the national airline of the Sultanate of Oman, has been awarded the 2023 Five-Star Major Airline rating by the Airline Passenger Experience Association (APEX). The award was announced on 26 October 2022 during the annual APEX/IFSA Expo in California, US. It’s the third consecutive year the airline has received the award, which measures customer feedback in a range of metrics including seat comfort, cabin service, in-flight meals and in-flight entertainment.
